author: cnbc.com
title: Legum & Norman is hosting “Key Things Every Board Member Should Know” Educational Seminar
text:
Ocean City, MD, April 17, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Legum & Norman Resorts, an Associa company, will be hosting their annual “Key Things Every Board Member Should Know” educational seminar on Monday, May 7, 2018, from 8:00AM – 12:30PM ET at the Clarion Resort Fontainebleau Hotel in Ocean City, Maryland.
The event will host guest speakers Chad Toms and Ray Via with the Whiteford, Taylor & Preston law firm as well as Ron Kirby from Associa Building Reserves. The panel of experts will be presenting on:
Understanding the responsibility of the board of directors How to run an election and nominating committee How technology and social media can affect community associations How to read and understand a reserve study Delaware and Maryland legislative updates
“Legum & Norman is dedicated to providing our board members with the most relevant and up-to-date information available,” stated Linda Fulkersin, Legum & Norman senior vice president. “The industry leaders who will present at this year’s event are the best in the business and will provide our attendees with important information that will help their communities not only run smoothly, but flourish. We encourage everyone to join us for this educational event.”
If you would like to attend the free event please RSVP to Lisa Meck by April 27, 2018, at lmeck@legumnorman.com or 410-524-5577. A complimentary breakfast will be provided to attendees.
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
